Title: A No-Rough-Stuff-Type Deal
Plot: Walter accepts his new identity as a drug dealer after a PTA meeting. Elsewhere, Jesse decides to put his aunt's house on the market and Skyler is the recipient of a baby shower.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Raymond Cruz, Cesar Garcia, Jesus Payan, Carmen Serano, Beth Bailey, Carrie Fleming
